--- Pacifix / Crossroads / Swoop ---

Pacifix frowns at Grimlock's bloodthristiness, but motions to 
Crotale to follow him as he exits the Hidden One, and moves out of 
the way, searchig for bots and allowing Grimlock an exit. 

Crossroads is bowled over, but manages not to be crushed as the 
massive Grimlock charges pasthim. He sits on the ground having 
been knocked down, and shakes his head.

Swoop follows Grimlock, hot on his heels, anxious to get into a 
fight where the Dinobots will crush all in their paths. 


On 20 Jul 2001, at 23:46, robertdahl wrote:

> Grimlock turns at the new set of orders, and transforms into his T-Rex
> mode. "Bout time me Grimlock get to tear into something." he snarled
> quietly, as he roared towards the exit, not watching out for
> Crossroads.
> 
> Strafe clenched both fists, and looked like he was going to burst,
> "All right, some action, some hard action, action to sink my teeth
> into, action to..." he was interupted by Lightspeed. 
> 
> "Whoa Strafe, let's get a look at the situation before we do anything
> harsh." he says calmly, running towards the door. Strafe looks on
> dumbfounded for a second, the gets the determined look on his face
> again, 
> 
> "No way, time to tear into some Decepticons." he says, as he runs over
> to the computer console, and presse a large blue button. At the push
> of the button, a large hole opens up in the roof. Strafe looks up,
> then leaps into the air, transforming into his futuristic jet mode, as
> he zooms out of the Hidden One, heading straight up into the air.
> 
>
